original_text: They left the hole where Jesus' body had been. They went to the 11 apostles. They told them what had happened. They also told all the other people who were there.
korean_text: 무덤에서 돌아가 이 모든 것을 열한 사도와 다른 모든 이에게 알리니

sentences.original_text: They told them what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 무슨 일이 있었는지 그들에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: They also told all the other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 다른 모든 사람들에게도 말했다
